column4: Tesla taps Audi executive as vice president of vehicle production
column5: Tesla Motors Inc  said on Friday it hired Volkswagen  executive Peter Hochholdinger as its vice president of vehicle production.

column4: Tesla taps Audi executive as vice president of vehicle production
column5: May 13 Tesla Motors Inc said on Friday it hired Volkswagen executive Peter Hochholdinger as its vice president of vehicle production.
